data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Angers drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In Angers Angers attack through Antonin Bobichon. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 9, Benoit Bastien awards Reims a goal kick.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Angers.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Stephane Bahoken is booked for the home team.
Reims are pushing forward but Mathieu Cafaro's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 22, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Angers.
Angers are coming forward and Baptiste Santamaria gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Angers have a goal kick.
Angers drives forward and Baptiste Santamaria gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 27, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Reims.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 36, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Angers just outside Reims's area.
Antonin Bobichon for Angers gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Angers.
In the minute 41, Thomas Mangani of Angers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Reims have a goal kick.
Wout Faes (Reims) has been shown a straight red card by referee Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 43, Angers have been given a penalty...
Benoit Bastien awards Angers a penalty but Stephane Bahoken misses from 12 yards.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 45, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Angers close to the penalty box.
In Angers Angers drive forward through Souleyman Doumbia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
In the minute 45, Reims have a dangerous throw-in.
Benoit Bastien blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Angers.
In the minute 46, Marshall Munetsi is on a sub for Arber Zeneli for Reims.
David Guion (Reims) is making a second substitution, with Dereck Kutesa replacing Mathieu Cafaro.
Angers drive upfield and Pierrick Capelle gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Reims defender.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Reims at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for Reims, close to Angers's area.
El Bilal Toure for Reims has been booked by Benoit Bastien and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Angers's Antonin Bobichon attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Benoit Bastien awards Reims a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Angers's Stephane Bahoken breaks free at Stade Raymond Kopa. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Romain Thomas (Angers) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 53, Benoit Bastien signals a Reims throw-in in Angers's half.
Free kick Reims.
Benoit Bastien awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Angers take a 1-0 lead thanks to Stephane Bahoken.
Great play from Antonin Bobichon to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Angers's Stephane Bahoken gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Romain Thomas has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 61, Valon Berisha is replacing Moreto Cassama for the away team.
Reims's Boulaye Dia gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Angers have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Mateo Pavlovic is replacing Antonin Bobichon for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Can Reims capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
In the minute 67, Free kick in a good position for Reims!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Angers.
Reims's Xavier Chavalerin misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 69, Angers have a goal kick.
Reims to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Stephane Moulin is making the team's second substitution at Stade Raymond Kopa with Lassana Coulibaly replacing Thomas Mangani.
In the minute 71, Angers make their third substitution with Sada Thioub replacing Pierrick Capelle.
In Angers a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ismael Traore of Angers gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Angers.
The away team replace Xavier Chavalerin with Tristan Dingome.
In the minute 77, Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Reims needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Baptiste Santamaria of Angers smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Stephane Bahoken with Lois Diony. This is the fourth substitution made today by Stephane Moulin.
Angers have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Reims to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
In the minute 81, Fraser Hornby is on a sub for El Bilal Toure for Reims.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Thomas Foket (Reims) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Angers defenders.
Reims will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Angers.
In the minute 86, Reims's Marshall Munetsi has been booked in Angers.
Angers are on the attack at Stade Raymond Kopa, where Angelo Fulgini is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Angers at Stade Raymond Kopa.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Reims are in shooting range from this free kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Reims.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Angers.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Angers.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Angelo Fulgini (Angers) gets a yellow card.
